items.name: Deathblade
items.effect: Gain 8 AD on takedown (max 10 stacks).

items.name: Giant Slayer
items.effect: Deal 25% more damage to enemies with 1600+ max HP.

items.name: Hextech Gunblade
items.effect: Heal for 25% of damage dealt. Excess healing becomes a shield.

items.name: Spear of Shojin
items.effect: Attacks restore 8 mana.

items.name: Edge of Night
items.effect: Once per combat, become stealthed and gain 40% attack speed.

items.name: Bloodthirster
items.effect: 25% Omnivamp. Once per combat, gain a 25% max HP shield for 5 seconds.

items.name: Zeke's Herald
items.effect: Allies within 1 hex gain 30% attack speed.

items.name: Infinity Edge
items.effect: Abilities can critically strike. +10% Crit Damage.

items.name: Guinsoo's Rageblade
items.effect: Attacks grant 5% bonus attack speed. Stacks infinitely.

items.name: Statikk Shiv
items.effect: Every 3rd attack deals magic damage to 4 enemies and shreds MR.

items.name: Titan's Resolve
items.effect: Gain 2 AD and AP on attack/taking damage (max 25 stacks). At max stacks, gain 25 Armor and MR.

items.name: Runaan's Hurricane
items.effect: Attacks fire bolts at 2 nearby enemies, dealing 55% AD.

items.name: Sunfire Cape
items.effect: Every 2 seconds, deal magic damage to adjacent enemies and burn them.

items.name: Rapid Firecannon
items.effect: Gain 1 attack range. Attacks cannot miss.

items.name: Last Whisper
items.effect: Physical damage shreds 50% of the target's Armor for 3 seconds.

items.name: Archangel's Staff
items.effect: Gain 20 AP every 5 seconds.

items.name: Locket of the Iron Solari
items.effect: At combat start, shield allies in the same row for 8 seconds.

items.name: Ionic Spark
items.effect: 50% Shred. Enemies within 2 hexes take magic damage when casting.

items.name: Morellonomicon
items.effect: Abilities burn enemies for 10 seconds, dealing 1% max HP as true damage per second and reducing healing.

items.name: Jeweled Gauntlet
items.effect: Abilities can critically strike. +10% Crit Damage.

items.name: Blue Buff
items.effect: Gain 20 starting mana. After casting, set mana to 20.

items.name: Frozen Heart
items.effect: Reduce attack speed of enemies within 2 hexes by 25%.

items.name: Chalice of Power
items.effect: At combat start, grant 30 AP to allies in the same row.

items.name: Redemption
items.effect: Heal allies within 1 hex for 15% max HP every 5 seconds. Take 25% less multi-target damage.

items.name: Hand of Justice
items.effect: Gain 15% AD and AP, and 15% Omnivamp.

items.name: Bramble Vest
items.effect: Take 8% less damage from attacks. Attackers take magic damage.

items.name: Gargoyle Stoneplate
items.effect: Gain 10 Armor and MR for each enemy targeting this unit.

items.name: Warmog's Armor
items.effect: Regenerate 3% max HP per second.

items.name: Shroud of Stillness
items.effect: At combat start, increase max mana of enemies within 2 hexes by 30%.

items.name: Dragon's Claw
items.effect: Take 10% less ability damage. Every 2 seconds, heal 1.2% max HP for each enemy targeting this unit.

items.name: Quicksilver
items.effect: Combat start: Immune to CC for 14 seconds.

items.name: Zephyr
items.effect: At combat start, banish an enemy for 5 seconds.

items.name: Sterak's Gage
items.effect: When below 60% HP, gain 25% max HP as a shield and 40% AD.

items.name: Thief's Gloves
items.effect: Each round, equip 2 random items. Consumes 3 item slots.

items.name: Tactician's Crown
items.effect: Gain +1 maximum team size.

items.name: Guardbreaker
items.effect: After damaging a shielded enemy, deal 25% more damage to them for 3 seconds.
